agency_desc: Provides access to brand name and generic prescription medication at low cost.
service_description: Provides access to brand name and generic prescription medication at low cost. An online catalog is available to find specific medications and discounted costs. A supply is given for up to 90 or 180 days at a time. Medications are available to patients with or without insurance. Medications may be mailed directly to the patient's home; free shipping is available.
site_details: Call to speak with a Patient Advocate for information and begin enrollment. Voicemails are returned within two business days. -OR- visit the website to enroll online. Be prepared to offer personal information, prescription order, and household income.
site_eligibility: Household income at or below 300% of the Federal Poverty Level -- With a doctor's prescription
